name: frontend-microfrontends
description: This is the best social media ever. This is just the repository for the frontend :D

scripts.start-all: concurrently "cd Root-Conf && yarn start" "cd navbar && yarn start --port 3000" "cd util-module && yarn start --port 3001" "cd globalStyles && yarn start --port 3002" "cd not-found && yarn start --port 3003" "cd create-post && yarn start --port 3004" "cd feed && yarn start --port 3005" "cd post && yarn start --port 3006" "cd profile && yarn start --port 3007" "cd login && yarn start --port 3008" "cd register && yarn start --port 3009" "cd freinds-chat && yarn start --port 3010" "cd chat && yarn start --port 3011" "cd search && yarn start --port 3012" "cd settings && yarn start --port 3013" "cd notifications && yarn start --port 3014" "cd notifications-page && yarn start --port 3015" "cd stories && yarn start --port 3016"
scripts.remove-s: concurrently "cd navbar && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd util-module && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd globalStyles && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd not-found && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd create-post && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd feed && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd post && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd profile && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd login && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd register && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd freinds-chat && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd chat && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd search && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd settings && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd notifications && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd notifications-page && yarn remove @types/styled-components" "cd stories && yarn remove @types/styled-components"
scripts.build-all: concurrently "cd Root-Conf && yarn build" "cd navbar && yarn build" "cd util-module && yarn build" "cd globalStyles && yarn build" "cd not-found && yarn build" "cd create-post && yarn build" "cd feed && yarn build" "cd post && yarn build" "cd profile && yarn build" "cd login && yarn build" "cd register && yarn build" "cd freinds-chat && yarn build" "cd chat && yarn build" "cd search && yarn build" "cd settings && yarn build" "cd notifications && yarn build" "cd notifications-page && yarn build" "cd stories && yarn build"
